CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
BRKN         	BROKEN CLOUDS                    	BRKN                      
CLER         	CLEAR                            	CLER                      
OBSC         	SKY OBSCURED                     	OBSC                       
OCST         	OVERCAST                         	OCST                       
SCAT         	SCATTERED CLOUDS                 	SCAT                       
99999        	SKY COND INVALID                 	ERROR MESSAGE
